Key Match Events: Mark Chapman's swashbuckling half-century powered New Zealand to beat Pakistan by seven wickets
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand won the toss and elected to bowl first against Pakistan
Mark Chapman and Saim Ayub played blistering knocks for New Zealand and Pakistan respectively
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand stunned Pakistan to keep the series alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shadab Khan and Saim Ayub propelled Pakistan to a formidable total
Shaheen Shah Afridi and Jacob Duffy bowled crucial overs
